mapper.insert: insert into Product (productTitle, productContent, saleStaus, hidden, productLookupCount, productLikeCount, categoryIdx, userIdx, createAt, status) values (#{productTitle},#{productContent}, #{saleStaus}, 0, #{productLookupCount}, #{productLikeCount}, #{categoryIdx}, #{userIdx}, now(), 0)
mapper.select: select productIdx from Product where userIdx=#{userIdx}
mapper.insert: insert into imageProduct (imageName, productIdx, firstImage) values (#{imageName},#{productIdx},#{firstImage})
